QuestData.Title: The Battle for Andorhal
QuestData.Description: We just received a gryphon from the plaguelands, bearing news. It doesn't sound good.$b$bThe city of Andorhal is in the middle of a three-way war between the Forsaken, the Alliance, and the Scourge. King Wrynn has rolled the dice and sent a death knight to lead the charge for his cause, but I'm sure he can use all the help he can get.$b$bThey specifically asked for an Alliance $c to participate in some specialized missions. If you accept the charge, speak to me again and I will prepare a portal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with War-Mage Erallier to be teleported to Andorhal in Western Plaguelands. Then report to Thassarian within Andorhal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Thassarian within Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.
